name: 3rd International Conference on NLP Techniques and Applications
content: 3rd International Conference on NLP Techniques and Applications (NLPTA 2022) December 23 \~ 24, 2022, Sydney, Australia https://cndc2022.org/nlpta/index Scope & Topics 3rd International Conference on NLP Techniques and Applications (NLPTA 2022) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications NLP Technologies & Applications. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following: • Phonology, Morphology • Chunking / Shallow Parsing • Parsing / Grammatical Formalisms • Semantic Processing • Lexical Semantics • Ontology • Linguistic Resources • Statistical and Knowledge based Methods • POS Tagging • Discourse • Paraphrasing / Entailment / Generation • Machine Translation • Information Retrieval • Text Mining • Information Extraction • Question Answering • Dialog Systems • Spoken Language Processing • Speech Recognition and Synthesis • Machine Learning & NLP • Information Retrieval and AI • Semantic & NLP • NLP for Big Data • NLP and Text Mining • Deep Learning and NLP Applications • NLP & Computational Linguistics Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by December 10, 2022\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from NLPTA 2022, after further revisions, will be published in the special issues of the following journals • International Journal of Computer Science & Information Technology (IJCSIT) - INSPEC, WJCI Indexed • International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) • International Journal of Web & Semantic Technology (IJWesT) • Information Technology in Industry (ITII) Important Dates Submission Deadline : December 10, 2022 Authors Notification : December 19, 2022 Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : December 21, 2022 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us: nlpta@cndc2022.org or nlptaconf@yahoo.com Submission System: https://cndc2022.org/submission/index.php
